title: Read.ME
description: Read.ME is a community forum-based inspired by sites like Reddit and Quora. This application uses web-token authentication, allowing logged users to shares posts and comments on various subjects. Read.ME is a fully responsive application, with data stored in a MySQL database.

title: Google Industry Project
description: Google TeleHealth is a tool to address communication challenges within the telehealth space, pitched to Google Representatives. Misunderstandings during a healthcare conversation are not only frustrating but can lead to dangerous health outcomes. Hearing disabilities and language barriers can make this communication even more frustrating. Using a combination of Speech-to-Text technology, as well as Web API's, Google TeleHealth allows doctors and patients the ability to transcribe what has been said to text.

title: InStock
description: InStock is a fully responsive warehouse and inventory management CRUD applciation, displaying warehouse and inventory information. Users are able to view, edit, add and delete warehouse and inventory items.

title: Brainflix
description: Brainflix is a fully responsive application built using React and Sass
